column1: #text=I needed a vacation so I went online and booked myself a ticket from my local airport to Mexico .
#text=As the day arrived , I packed everything I needed into a carry on bag and headed to the airport .
#text=Once there I got my ticket printed out and checked in .
#text=I had to go through security and then wait for about 45 minutes at the terminal .
#text=Once they announced boarding , I got in line and walked onto the plane .
#text=I then stowed my carry on bag above me and put my backpack under the seat in front of me .
#text=I got situated with a book and put my seatbelt on .
#text=During the flight I put in some ear buds and listened to music while I read .
#text=I got a water from the flight attendant and a small bag of peanuts .
#text=Once the plane landed , everyone got up and waited for a while as the people in front slowly filed out .
#text=When it was finally my turn I grabbed my carry on bag from above and exited the plane .
